alert.note: Alert for Bear Lake and Bear River Valley; Cache Valley, Utah Portion; Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Tooele and Rush Valleys (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:41AM MST until December 13 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches valley floors, 2 to 6 inches benches. * WHERE...Tooele and Rush Valleys, Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley, Cache Valley/Utah Portion and Bear Lake and Bear River Valley. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are possible for the Monday morning commute, particularly north of Salt Lake City. Snow will shift to a more showery mode later this morning, with periodic winter driving conditions possible into Tuesday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.
